A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extraordinary visuals and astounding soundtrack is not enough to save a movie. Featuring both unconvincing villains and heroes\, a terrible storyline\, lack of respect for Star Wars lore\, this movie is one of the worst movies I have seen in recent times. Also\, the attempt to push politics came off\, at best\, as plain silly\, at worst extremely cringeworthy. But one fundamentally good thing. It will serve as an example for decades to come on how NOT to make a movie\, and as such\, serves a purpose. Avoid at all cost\, unless you are a student of movie-making learning how NOT to make a movie.
